description:
Thanks to some modifications to the Going Merry, the Straw Hats are on their way to that island in the sky! But with the Blackbeard Pirates in hot pursuit, navigating the vertical currents will be anything but easy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fune wa Sora o Yuku! Knock-Up Stream ni Nore
Le bateau part dans le ciel ! Chevauchons le Knock-Up Stream
Take to the Sky! Ride the Knockup Stream!
Путешествие на небо! Оседлав восходящий поток
เดินทางสู่ท้องฟ้า มุ่งหน้าสู่น็อคอัพสตรีม
船は空をゆく! 突き上げる海流[ノックアップストリーム]に乗れ
